meanings.sent1: The organism is multicelled, meaning it is made up of many cells.
meanings.sent2: The multicelled creature displayed complex behavior due to its numerous cells.
meanings.sent3: The multicelled plant decided to have a cell party to celebrate its diversity.
meanings.sent4: The multicelled organism was like a bustling city, with each cell playing a vital role.
meanings.sent5: The multicelled structure resembled a vibrant mosaic of tiny building blocks.

meanings.sent1: The multicelled organism was able to perform various functions thanks to its multiple cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the multicelled creature to understand the benefits of having more than one cell.
meanings.sent3: The multicelled organism joked that having extra cells was like having a built-in support group.
meanings.sent4: The multicelled structure was a masterpiece of biological engineering, showcasing the power of collaboration.
meanings.sent5: The multicelled organism thrived in its environment, utilizing its multiple cells for survival.
